sentence: He has since distanced himself from that view, and he has nevertheless attracted the backing of populist firebrands Marjorie Taylor Greene and Madison Cawthorn, who represent House districts in Georgia and North Carolina, respectively.
author: Stephanie Akin
title: GOP primary in Texas tests how far Trump loyalty should extend

sentence: In addition to Cruz, Collins boasted endorsements from North Carolina Rep. Madison Cawthorn and those critical of McCarthy: a PAC aligned with the House Freedom Caucus and Georgia Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene.
author: Emily Brooks
title: Navy SEAL Morgan Luttrell wins in Texas House primary that was GOP proxy war
